content: increase 38 row 4 half_double_crochet 1st st *fpdc one row below and one space over bpdc one row 158 repeat row 140 for 38 st single_crochet 46 st 84 row below in skipped space repeat from * to end of row half_double_crochet last st chain row 159 chain 1 turn single_crochet 46 st resume scls the end chain 1 turn 84 2 turn see stitch diagram row 160 single_crochet 1st st single_crochet 1st space chain 1 *single_crochet next space chain 1 repeat from * for 38 st at row 5 repeat row 2 single crochets *single_crochet next single_crochet chain 1 skip single_crochet repeat from * to end 84 row 6 single_crochet in each st to end continue single_crochet along outside of the entire scarf/ 161 - 264 appox 16 inches single_crochet first st single_crochet first space chain 1 *single_crochet next space chain 1 repeat hood slip_stitch into first single_crochet leave a tail and weave in to finish from * to last space single_crochet last st chain 1 turn 84
